scripts.usemin: usemin contactus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contactus.html && usemin astr.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/astr.html && usemin book.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/book.html && usemin chess.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/chess.html && usemin cricket.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/cricket.html && usemin drama.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/drama.html && usemin film.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/film.html && usemin foto.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/foto.html && usemin hock.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/hock.html && usemin lawn.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/lawn.html && usemin litc.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/litc.html && usemin litm.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/litm.html && usemin mailer.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/mailer.html && usemin manthan.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/manthan.html && usemin roboism.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/roboism.html && usemin spec.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/spec.html && usemin srijan.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/srijan.html && usemin tt.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/tt.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html
